review_data.title: Best Espresso in town
review_data.content: Best espresso in town for a very good price. You need also to try the rabarber shorley. Great in summer with many tables outside.

review_data.title: Delicious
review_data.content: Really nice and vivid place in the middle of Zurich. The food was excellent- lot of vegetarian and vegan options! The service was good and really friendly- thx Luca! :)

review_data.title: Low quality drinks- high zurich prices
review_data.content: We ordered a prosecco and a white wine. It was served in plastic cups and we were chared about 19 chf. We are not picky, complainy people but honestly- both the prosecco and the wine we did not finish cause its taste was very bad.

review_data.title: Dimanche 7 avril 2019
review_data.content: Food is ok but the service is poor and unfriendly. They don’t manage at all when many people come at the same time and instead of trying their best they get arrogant. A shame for ZurIch.

review_data.title: Quiet location and nice staff
review_data.content: Stumbled on this place on a Sunday morning as the croissants were being delivered and returned for breakfast. I was lucky to come early, as it is obviously a local favorite and filled up fast. Great place to start the morning.

review_data.title: Bester Kaffee in der Stadt

review_data.title: Sehr feines Frühstück
review_data.content: Liebenswürdiges Café mit kleiner aber feiner Frühstückskarte, gemütlich zum Sitzen, unkompliziertes gemischtes Publikum und super freundlicher Service!

review_data.title: Alternative style but very good meals
review_data.content: I stayed overnight close to that place and started to have a beer only. Next morning a good breakfast and then in the evening a delicious dinner. Very nice place with an alternative style, offering newspapers, good food and atmosphere

review_data.title: Love this place!
review_data.content: Little gem in Zürich. Best on Sunday afternoon, especially on a sunny day. Cool, simple, alternative crowd and the BEST schale (milk coffe) in the entire universe! Also, the cakes are super tasty! Beyond that, the staff is always smiling and happy :) love it!

review_data.title: Staff was very nice, drink was poor

review_data.title: Rustic restaurant serving French themed food
review_data.content: Popped in here at lunchtime for dessert and coffee. The restaurant was heaving with diners but we took the opportunity of the lovely weather to sit outside and enjoy a delicious dessert. I chose the cheescake which was onne of the best I have tasted....More

review_data.title: Very yummy & cool
review_data.content: The lunch menu and the pastries were amazing. Simple and very tasty. I love the casual style. You feel home away from home. The terrasse is a unique gem in town. I am back soon again.

review_data.title: Food with character
review_data.content: Recently moved to Zurich and on the hunt for nice casual cafes, I came across Cafe du Bonheur recently. It's definitely not mainstream and a nice menu (mostly seasonal) to go with its character. Definitely worth a visit.

review_data.title: Schöne Stunden im Sonnenschein

review_data.title: tolles Essen und schöne Atmosphäre
review_data.content: Das Café du Bonheur ist ein kleines Bijou. Die Küche ist kreativ und absolut empfehlenswert. Im Sommer kann man draussen...More

review_data.title: Really cool place
review_data.content: The cafe is situated in a very quiet area, you can sit in the square surrounded by a fountain, trees and flowers and drink wine. The food is also great. Perfect place for a summer relax.

review_data.title: Cool hype café
review_data.content: This small café has a lot of character. It's cool and not mainstream at all. It's a nice hangout. I come often on Sunday morning and it is usually full of people for brunch. I never tried the brunch myself, but coffee, hot chocolate, cappuccino...More

review_data.content: Ideal für entspanntes Frühstück, mit kleinem aber qualitativ hochwertigem Angebot. Werden sicher für ein Abendessen wiederkommen.

review_data.title: Bonne chance rather than bonheur

review_data.title: A great experience
review_data.content: A special night out with friends and family. The menu is unique and intentionally small which makes it very special. A definite visit!
